code: import client from'./client';export var loadTags=function loadTags(uid){return client.get("/api/friends/tags/".concat(uid));};export var addTag=function addTag(_ref){var tags=_ref.tags,uid=_ref.uid;return client.post('/api/friends/tags',{tags:tags,uid:uid});};export var removeTag=function removeTag(_ref2){var tags=_ref2.tags,uid=_ref2.uid;return client.patch('/api/friends/tags',{tags:tags,uid:uid});};export var getRecommend=function getRecommend(_ref3){var filter=_ref3.filter,uid=_ref3.uid;return client.get("/api/friends/recommend?uid=".concat(uid,"&filter=").concat(filter));};export var friendRequest=function friendRequest(_ref4){var sender=_ref4.sender,receiver=_ref4.receiver;return client.post('/api/friends/request',{sender:sender,receiver:receiver});};export var requestFriendsList=function requestFriendsList(_ref5){var uid=_ref5.uid;return client.get("/api/friends/friends_list?uid=".concat(uid));};export var requestFriendRequestList=function requestFriendRequestList(_ref6){var uid=_ref6.uid;return client.get("/api/friends/friend_request_list?uid=".concat(uid));};export var requestMessagesList=function requestMessagesList(_ref7){var uid=_ref7.uid;return client.get("/api/friends/messages?uid=".concat(uid));};export var acceptFriendRequest=function acceptFriendRequest(_ref8){var sender=_ref8.sender,receiver=_ref8.receiver;return client.post('/api/friends/messages',{sender:sender,receiver:receiver});};export var refuseFriendRequest=function refuseFriendRequest(_ref9){var sender=_ref9.sender,receiver=_ref9.receiver,type=_ref9.type;return client.delete("/api/friends/messages?sender=".concat(sender,"&receiver=").concat(receiver,"&type=").concat(type));};
